### Instituição

### Áreas de Atuação

### Atuação no Projeto

To find, validate and exploit differences between protozoan and mammalian metabolism, in particular the molecular and biochemical parasitology, including T. brucei, T.cruzi, Leishmania, Toxoplasma and Plasmodium, treated by antimicrobial photodynamic therapy (aPDT) in collaboration with Martha S. Ribeiro from IPEN.
